example.text: While President Biden refuses to rise to his duty, I'm rising to mine. Under his failed leadership, fentanyl-related deaths, child trafficking, and cartel profits are up. My border plan puts an end to all of it.

This is great news! As part of my years-long efforts to increase the safety of law enforcement officers and the communities they serve, I joined this bipartisan initiative led by US Senators John Cornyn (R-Texas) and Sheldon Whitehouse (D-RI).
It passed unanimously on Thursday, helping to raise awareness and support efforts to eradicate this terrible disease. Read more about our resolution !
In just 2 years, the Biden administration has made everything worse for Americans. Our country deserves better than this. [[url]]

As member of the Senate Committee on Foreign Relations, I was honored to meet with Japanese Ambassador Tomita. Japan is a key ally for the US and deepening our countries’ relationship is critical as we pursue a free, open, and secure Asia-Pacific. [[url]]

This disease affects approximately 100,000 individuals throughout our nation, with 1,000 babies inheriting this disease each year. I, along with Senator Cory Booker (D-NJ) and 12 of our Senate colleagues, introduced a resolution designating Sickle Cell Disease Awareness Month.
